channel.title: Project decimate is back
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dWnhdq1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1O2v0Pb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img]Website: [URL=http://Armadyl.org]Armadyl.org | HomePage[/URL]
[IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img]Website: [URL=https://armadyl.org/forum/forum.php]Armadyl.org | Forums[/URL]
[IMG]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3f/House_icon.png[/img]Website: [URL=https://armadyl.org/webclient.php]WebClient[/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iSyYxLi.png[/img]
[b] [B]- PVP COMBAT -[/B][/b] â€¢ Perfect clipped following. â€¢ Clipped projectiles for both ranged and magic. â€¢ Perfect max hit, and attack/defense formulas. â€¢ All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs players. â€¢ Working curse prayers, and regular prayers. â€¢ PvP point shops that requires kills to unlock new items. Every kill you get unlocks a new item in the shop. â€¢ Uncheatable PvP point system. â€¢ Chance of a PvP item drop when killing other players in the wild. â€¢ Perfect animations, hit delays, weapon speeds. â€¢ Correct item effects, spirit sheilds, DFS, barrows, slayer helm etc. â€¢ Fully working curses with correct effects. â€¢ Instant switching. â€¢ Vengeance. â€¢ Ring of recoil.
[B]- PVM COMBAT -[/B] â€¢ Perfect clipped following, and walking for NPCs. â€¢ Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs. â€¢ All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs. â€¢ Npcs don't walk on top of one another. â€¢ Can't diagnal fight or stand on Npc. â€¢ Multi barrage. [B][COLOR=orange] - BOSSES & MONSTERS -[/COLOR][/B] â€¢ King Black dragon â€¢ Dagannoth kings â€¢ Chaos elemental â€¢ Kalphite queen â€¢ Godwars Bosses & minions in the Godwars dungeon â€¢ Nex â€¢ Nomad â€¢ Barrelchest â€¢ Decaying Avatar, Avatar of Destruction, Avatar of Creation â€¢ Corperal beast â€¢ Dreadnaut â€¢ Bork â€¢ Primal warriors â€¢ Tormented demons â€¢ Revenants â€¢ Glacors â€¢ Unholy cursebearer â€¢ Strykewyrms â€¢ Frost dragons â€¢ Chaos tunnels â€¢ Mithril dragons â€¢ Slayer dungeon â€¢ Ranged & Mage training dungeon. [B][COLOR=orange] - MINIGAMES -[/COLOR][/B] â€¢ Fight caves â€¢ Fight pits â€¢ Warriors guild â€¢ Duel arena â€¢ Pest control â€¢ Barrows â€¢ Fun pk â€¢ Barbarian Defence â€¢ Spirit warriors â€¢ Champions challenge â€¢ Demon slayer â€¢ Recipe for Disaster â€¢ Camelot drop party daily server event
[B][COLOR=orange][COLOR=orange]- SKILLING -[/COLOR][/COLOR][/B] â€¢ Skillcapes, and proper emotes.
â€¢ Max cape available when all stats are maxed at 99.
â€¢ Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks.
â€¢ Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, recover special, and super prayer potions.
â€¢ Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
â€¢ Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
â€¢ Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well.
â€¢ Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations with agility ticket rewards shop.
â€¢ Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out.
â€¢ Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.
â€¢ Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations.
â€¢ Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations.
â€¢ Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash.
â€¢ Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches.
â€¢ Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.
â€¢ Working prayer skill. Use bones on altar, all bones able to be buried.[/center][/COLOR]
[center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WnU8Wb5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MUkNYGp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/20qYUp2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EV54COj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ASxPa8U.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/la1T0qF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SSBTar7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bl0ZCJD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eJmskB4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Yjwi2On.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VkAH5Ex.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CMAZTnT.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Project decimate is back

item.description:

Armadyl is my server name! people know it.

item.title: Project decimate is back
item.dc:creator: @Wrestle Wrestle
item.description:
@Wrestle wrote:

DevilXsummoner:

How is this project decimate?

how is this not? I was the administrator on PD and Ultima handed me the source to carry on the server while he was at college and can’t run it.

Read full topic

item.title: Project decimate is back

item.description:
@Wrestle wrote:

[CENTER]

Website: [URL=http://Armadyl.org]Armadyl.org | HomePage[/URL]

Website: [URL=https://armadyl.org/forum/forum.php]Armadyl.org | Forums[/URL]

Website: [URL=https://armadyl.org/webclient.php]WebClient[/URL]

[b]
- PVP COMBAT -[/B]
â€¢ Perfect clipped following.
â€¢ Clipped projectiles for both ranged and magic.
â€¢ Perfect max hit, and attack/defense formulas.
â€¢ All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs players.
â€¢ Working curse prayers, and regular prayers.
â€¢ PvP point shops that requires kills to unlock new items. Every kill you get unlocks a new item in the shop.
â€¢ Uncheatable PvP point system.
â€¢ Chance of a PvP item drop when killing other players in the wild.
â€¢ Perfect animations, hit delays, weapon speeds.
â€¢ Correct item effects, spirit sheilds, DFS, barrows, slayer helm etc.
â€¢ Fully working curses with correct effects.
â€¢ Instant switching.
â€¢ Vengeance.
â€¢ Ring of recoil.

[B]- PVM COMBAT -[/B]
â€¢ Perfect clipped following, and walking for NPCs.
â€¢ Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs.
â€¢ All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs.
â€¢ Npcs don’t walk on top of one another.
â€¢ Can’t diagnal fight or stand on Npc.
â€¢ Multi barrage.
[B][COLOR=orange]

  • BOSSES & MONSTERS -[/COLOR][/B]
    â€¢ King Black dragon
    â€¢ Dagannoth kings
    â€¢ Chaos elemental
    â€¢ Kalphite queen
    â€¢ Godwars Bosses & minions in the Godwars dungeon
    â€¢ Nex
    â€¢ Nomad
    â€¢ Barrelchest
    â€¢ Decaying Avatar, Avatar of Destruction, Avatar of Creation

    â€¢ Dreadnaut
    â€¢ Bork
    â€¢ Primal warriors
    â€¢ Tormented demons
    â€¢ Revenants

    â€¢ Unholy cursebearer
    â€¢ Strykewyrms
    â€¢ Frost dragons
    â€¢ Chaos tunnels
    â€¢ Mithril dragons
    â€¢ Slayer dungeon
    â€¢ Ranged & Mage training dungeon.
    [B][COLOR=orange]
  • MINIGAMES -[/COLOR][/B]
    â€¢ Fight caves
    â€¢ Fight pits
    â€¢ Warriors guild
    â€¢ Duel arena
    â€¢ Pest control
    â€¢ Barrows
    â€¢ Fun pk

    â€¢ Recipe for Disaster
    â€¢ Camelot drop party daily server event

[B][COLOR=orange][COLOR=orange]- SKILLING -[/COLOR][/COLOR][/B]
â€¢ Skillcapes, and proper emotes.

â€¢ Max cape available when all stats are maxed at 99.

â€¢ Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks.

â€¢ Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, recover special, and super prayer potions.

â€¢ Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.

â€¢ Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.

â€¢ Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well.

â€¢ Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations with agility ticket rewards shop.

â€¢ Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out.

â€¢ Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.

â€¢ Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations.

â€¢ Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations.

â€¢ Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash.

â€¢ Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches.

â€¢ Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.

â€¢ Working prayer skill. Use bones on altar, all bones able to be buried.[/center][/COLOR]
